backend/main.mo: Defines core actor types and comparison functions for restaurants, menu items, orders, and cuisine types, integrating storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type definitions mirroring the main backend structures and a no-op migration that returns the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking admin UI changes to specific frontend files and components, with metadata and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, pages, hooks, styles, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base variables and dark mode theming using OKLCH color values for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container and loading the main React TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling routing between pages, theme setup, authentication state, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing restaurant contact info, social icons, and attribution, pulling data via a restaurant query.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, auth handling, admin access checks, cart count, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/LiveOrderDetails: Displays a modal with detailed order info, including status, timestamps, items, and live map location.
frontend/src/components/LiveOrdersView.t: Shows all active orders with admin actions, polling updates, notifications, and a selectable details modal.
frontend/src/components/OrderLocationMap: Embeds an OpenStreetMap iframe that updates whenever provided coordinates change.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a modal form for users to enter and save their profile information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveLocationSharin: Handles continuous geolocation tracking and pushes live location updates to an order when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, restaurants, menu items, cart items, and orders.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface for managing menu items and orders, including image uploads, status updates, and live orders.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, allows editing customer details, removing items, and placing orders.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays restaurant menu with search, category filtering, and add‑to‑cart functionality using local and backend images.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows user order history, status indicators, and manages live location sharing for active orders.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a restaurant page.
frontend/src/utils/externalMaps.ts: Utility functions generating Google Maps and OpenStreetMap URLs for given coordinates.
frontend/src/utils/menuItemImage.ts: Provides image validation, file-to-bytes conversion, and preview URL utilities for menu item images.
frontend/src/utils/requiredMenuItems.ts: Defines required menu items and ensures they are present by merging them into fetched menu items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, feature requirements, and pending requests related to order rejection behavior in the admin UI.
